content: Povero ragazzo! Se solo avesse saputo allora le cose terribili che dovevano accadergli a causa della sua disobbedienza!
translations: eng:Poor boy! If he had only known then the dreadful things that were to happen to him on account of his disobedience!
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
